author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Kellogg Declares Regular Dividend Of $0.54 Per Share; Announces Plans For 4 Pct Dividend Increase
text:
April 27, 2018 / 12:52 PM / in 11 minutes BRIEF-Kellogg Declares Regular Dividend Of $0.54 Per Share; Announces Plans For 4 Pct Dividend Increase Reuters Staff 1 Min Read
 Kellogg Co:
* KELLOGG COMPANY DECLARES REGULAR DIVIDEND OF $0.54 PER SHARE AND ANNOUNCES PLANS FOR 4% DIVIDEND INCREASE
* KELLOGG - PLANS TO INCREASE QUARTERLY DIVIDEND BY 4 PERCENT TO $0.56/SHARE BEGINNING WITH Q3 2018 Source text: [ prn.to/2r1DP0W ]
